definition: superfluous/redundant/cumbersome/refers to a son-in-law living with wife's family

sentences.english: I dont like the diffuse style of his writings.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡他寫作中冗贅的文體。

sentences.english: If a retransmission request is asked by CRC check, it needs to retransmit the whole packet.
sentences.chinese: 在循環冗贅覈對中若需要重傳將使得整個封包被重傳。

sentences.english: I got lost in your rather diffuse essay.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章行文冗贅，弄得我有點糊塗了。
